Kenny Greene (Jenụwarị 17, 1969 Ọktoba 1, 2001) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu na-ede egwu onye bụkwa ónyé otu R&B Intro.
Dị ka ónyé otu R&B Intro, Greene dere ma mepụta ọtụtụ egwu nke otu ahụ ma bụrụ onye na-eduzi olu
O dekwara ọtụtụ egwu màkà ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ, dịka "Reminisce" nke Mary J
Màkà ọrụ ya na Blige, Greene ritere ihe nríte Songwriter of the Year site na American Society of Composers, Authors & Publishers. Greene sokwa Will Smith, Cam'ron na 98 Degrees rụkọọ ọrụ.
N'afọ 1998, ónyé na-agụ egwu ahụ pụtara na album Cam'ron Confessions of Fire na album AZ Pieces of a Man
Ógè ikpeazụ o dekọrọ bụ na mbido afọ 2001 na-abụ abụ maka Tyrese na egwu "For Always" na 2000 Watts album.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2001 ya na magazin Sister 2 Sister, Greene kpughere na ya bụ nwoke na nwanyị na na na ọ na-arịa ọrịa AIDS. Ọ nwụrụ na New York City mgbè ọ dị afọ 32 n'ihi nsogbụ nkè ọrịa ahụ.
